**Example 1: 根据交易哈希查询交易信息**



Input: 

```
tccli tbaas GetTransByHashHandler --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Module transaction \
    --Operation get_trans_by_hash \
    --GroupPk 11_1 \
    --TransHash 0x0b47e55c52f9b3ae60bc960809fe50042c0aa9e8207795759a6369db2997254a
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "d124dbd0-b0e5-4762-9ca1-37a99bd63a0f",
        "TransactionJson": "{\"blockNumberRaw\": \"0x6\", \"gasPriceRaw\": \"0x11e1a300\", \"raw\": null, \"from\": \"0x7d6bd56339c7ccf5d6ae888297ae1429e9633179\", \"blockHash\": \"0xd02b051bedfa8750d4c78e53464d9e937efb03833b949945d1e80d7a29241707\", \"to\": \"0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001003\", \"input\": \"\", \"nonce\": 1479624335339271316984886221247539569183895899581090166838876243748063419718, \"hash\": \"0x0b47e55c52f9b3ae60bc960809fe50042c0aa9e8207795759a6369db2997254a\", \"v\": 0, \"gas\": 300000000, \"transactionIndexRaw\": \"0x0\", \"blockNumber\": 6, \"publicKey\": null, \"nonceRaw\": \"0x345700cda7d2642cf00356ba9727b5cec4eb14c228ad1f6358e07ba0b121d46\", \"gasPrice\": 300000000, \"gasRaw\": \"0x11e1a300\", \"value\": 0, \"creates\": null, \"s\": null, \"r\": null, \"valueRaw\": \"0x0\", \"transactionIndex\": 0}"
    }
}
```
